# Theta Figures

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(stargazer)
library(reshape2)
library(cowplot)
library(akima)
```

```{r}

M_ab_sens = read.csv(here("data","outputs","theta_Mab.csv")) 

```

```{r}

# Conservation Value Plot
# Comparing non-cooperative stock sizes (x_a_non + x_b_non) to Patch A as sole owner stock size.

theta_Mab <- M_ab_sens %>% 
  select(M_ab, x_a_non, x_b_non, x_a_so, x_b_so, x_a_soa, WTP_A, WTA_B, accept)

# Create a new dataframe with separate columns for x_a_non and x_b_non
theta_Mab_stacked <- theta_Mab %>%
  select(M_ab, x_a_non, x_b_non, x_a_soa, x_a_so, x_b_so) %>% 
  mutate(x_ab_so = x_a_so + x_b_so) %>% 
  mutate(x_ab_non = x_a_non + x_b_non) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(x_ab_non, x_ab_so, x_a_soa), names_to = "Category", values_to = "Value")

# Create the stacked bar graph
ggplot(data = theta_Mab_stacked, aes(x = M_ab, y = Value, fill = Category)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  labs(x = "M_ab", y = "Value") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("x_ab_non" = "blue", "x_ab_so" = "red", "x_a_soa" = "green")) +  # Customize fill colors
  theme_minimal()

```
